directions: In a large bowl, toss berries with sugar and let stand at room temperature for 10 minutes.
In a small bowl, combine the vinegar and pepper. Pour over berries and toss to coat. Divide berries among 4 serving bowls and serve. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds fresh strawberries, rinsed and sliced
title: Sweet and Tart Strawberry Salad
